name: 林冠中
objective: 瞭解工程系統中常用數學之原理及應用，內容包含：1.傅立葉(Fourier)級數及轉換，2.矩陣代數，3.偏微分方程式，4.複變函數，5. 向量分析與運算
schedule:
1. 矩陣基本運算
1. 傅立葉(Fourier)級數及轉換
2. 複變函數
4. 基礎向量分析
materials:
1. 自編教材 
2. 工程數學，莊紹容、楊精松 編著 (5/e)
3. Differential Equations with Boundary-Value Problems by Zill (9/e)
4. Fundamentals of Complex Analysis Engineering Science and Mathematics by Saff (3/e)

深入閱讀(中文)：
1. 傅立葉分析與應用，林琦焜 著
2. 複變函數暨其應用，林輔 編撰

深入閱讀(英文)：
1. Fourier Series and Boundary Value Problems,  James Ward Brown and Ruel V. Churchill (8/e)
2. Partial Differential Equations with Fourier Series and Boundary Value Problems, Nakhle H. Asmar (2/e)
3. Complex Variables and Applications, James Ward Brown and Ruel V. Churchill (9/e)
4. Vector Calculus, Susan Jane Colley (4/e)  
5. Advanced Engineering Mathematics, Erwin Kreyszig (10/e)
